original_text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem, he assayed to join himself to the disciples: but they were all afraid of him, and believed not that he was a disciple.
korean_text: 사울이 예루살렘에 가서 제자들을 사귀고자 하나 다 두려워하여 그가 제자 됨을 믿지 아니하니

sentences.original_text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem,
he assayed to join himself to the disciples:
but they were all afraid of him,
and believed not that he was a disciple.
